    Find a Doctor

Alert popouts

Alert popout default

Telemedicine Visits Available

We can now offer the option of seeing your physician and care team through telemedicine either by real-time video or telephone. If you are interested in making a telemedicine appointment, please call 1.800.KIDS.DOC (1.800.543.7362).

Alert popout secondary

Telemedicine Visits Available

We can now offer the option of seeing your physician and care team through telemedicine either by real-time video or telephone. If you are interested in making a telemedicine appointment, please call 1.800.KIDS.DOC (1.800.543.7362).

Alert popout drawer (bottom)

Brand feature

Top Ranked
Pediatric Hospital

At Lurie Children's, a top-ranked children's hospital, we put children and their families at the center of all we do — from before birth, through childhood and adolescence, and beyond. Because we're passionate about helping children become happy, healthy adults.

Specialties and Conditions

Flex messaging

Patrick M. Magoon Institute for Healthy Communities at Lurie Children’s

The new Patrick M. Magoon Institute for Healthy Communities serves as the hub for all community-focused initiatives at Lurie Children’s. It partners with community organizations to reach youth where they live, learn and play and helps them thrive. It also strives to address the root causes of health disparities for children and adolescents.

Learn more

News

News (large variant)

A First at Lurie Children’s Likely Means a Better Future for Max

“Looking back, we have no doubt that we made the best decision for him,”

Max and Mallorie were the first at The Chicago Institute for Fetal Health at Lurie Children’s to undergo an innovative approach to repairing spina bifida before a baby is born.

Read their story

Featured ways to help

Homepage version

Innovating every day through pediatric research that changes the world.

The research arm of the Ann & Robert H. Lurie Children’s Hospital of Chicago, we are one of the only freestanding pediatric research centers in the country. We are located inside a hub of innovation, inside the Simpson Querrey Biomedical research building on the campus of our academic partner, Northwestern University’s Feinberg School of Medicine.

Our research

Join Us in Creating a Healthier Future for Every Child

Every day, Lurie Children’s is relentlessly pursuing better ways to prevent, diagnose and treat childhood illnesses and support our patients and families. We are on a mission to provide the promise of a cure, a safer space and a healthier future for every child. But, we can’t do it alone.

Ways to help Donate

Ways to help page version

New thinking about healing kids: Crown Sky Garden Opens

Creating the Crown Sky Garden was a complex, multidisciplinary process that brought together the best minds in design and patient care with children and families who had direct patient experience.

Learn more

Ways to Help

You have the power to change a child’s life. Your investment will be a catalyst for the innovations and discoveries that will lead to lifesaving cures for kids. Explore all the ways you can help below.

Make a gift online Feel good gifts Tribute gifts All options

Heading overrides


Heading classes are available to override the base heading tag styles. In this way the heading structure can be maintained without sacrificing the intended look and feel.

This is an h1 styled as an h6

This is an h2 styled as an h5

This is an h3 styled as an h4

This is an h4 styled as an h3

This is an h5 styled as an h2
This is an h6 styled as an h1

Connect with us

Lurie Children’s provides healthcare regardless of race, color, religions (creed), sex, gender identity or expressions, sexual orientation, national origin (ancestry), or disablity.

Lurie Children’s complies with applicable federal civil rights laws and does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, or disability.
